title: Hey I accidently misread crit damage runes as crit runes and wasted 2 weeks of grinding...
body:
I am so fucking tired and this sucks that it is so easy to make a mistake such as this.

I know my cry will go unheard but for what it is worth could I lose those runes and have my ip back?

replies.body: if you have no refunds riot are not obliged to return your ip for your mistake
